content.rendered:
Kérastase hair products are available at Luxe Concept Salon, Chatswood.  Don’t live in Sydney? No problem – we are happy to arrange postage to anywhere in Australia.  You can either buy Kérastase online via our shop – or call us to discuss the best product and arrange delivery.

Representing the finest in luxury care for hair, Kérastase has been setting the standards of professional hair care products for over 50 years and at Luxe we are very proud to offer the full range of these luxury products and treatments.

Every woman wants exceptional hair, but the solution is not the same for everyone. Hair type, scalp concerns, internal and external factors are some of the variables that can affect the health of the hair. It requires personal attention and expertise to resolve all of these factors into one very individual, yet perfect, head of hair. Kérastase creates innovative products and bespoke rituals for flawless results.

Contact Luxe to learn more about the Kérastase products and view the range now.
